remarks: The subclass relationship between two ordinals is inherited by their predecessors.  The converse implies excluded middle, as shown at ~ onsucsssucexmid .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro and Jim Kingdon, 29-Jul-2019.)
statement: onsucsssucr $p |- ( ( A e. On /\ Ord B ) -> ( suc A C_ suc B -> A C_ B ) ) $.
